name: @wessberg/stringutil
description: A class for performing simple operations on strings.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:compiled
scripts.build: npm run build:pre && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es2015
scripts.validate: npm run tslint && npm run test
scripts.pretest: npm run clean:compiled && npm run tsc:test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run build
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish

author: Frederik Wessberg
